# description

**Instance Property**

A short description of what the model does and/or its purpose.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String
```

## Getting the properties

- **author**: The author of this model.
- **creatorDefined**: Creator-defined custom metadata.
- **license**: License information for the model.
- **version**: A version number encoded as a string.

items.description: A version number encoded as a string.
items.name: version
